dict.acceptation: （与形容词和副词连用）很，非常；（与动词连用）非常；
分组，把…划分（常与out连用）；把（土地）划分成块；

sent.orig: LOT of data retrieval, can automatically determine certain input errors, Amendment error, display the contents.
sent.trans: LOT数据的检索，可以自动判定一定的输入错误，修订错误，显示内容。

sent.orig: LOT is first adopted in the watermarking algorithm instead of DCT,which greatly reduces the blocking effects.
sent.trans: 本文首次在水印算法中采用了LOT以代替传统的离散余弦变换 (DCT) ,从而有效地避免了DCT的块效应 。

sent.orig: To propose LOT priority adjustment based on WIP.
sent.trans: 依据WIP提出LOT流程安排的先后。

sent.orig: You can go a lot further and fare a lot worse.
sent.trans: 这山望着那山高，到了那山把脚翘。

sent.orig: Inter-banking not brings a lot of advantages of competition, but also brings a lot of risks.
sent.trans: 网络银行带来了银行业的竞争优势，但同时也带来了一系列的风险。
